ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Package designed for working with vectors and lists of vectors, mainly for turning them into other indexed data structures.
Package designed for working with vectors and lists of vectors, mainly for turning them into other indexed data structures.

name: r-turner
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.2.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-turner
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/turner_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/turner/turner_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 03337c84b06fa25eff60719877562532c471da25325a35482d086dc4a648d418

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 0
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:

  host:
    - r-base
    - r-tester
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-tester

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('turner')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('turner')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://www.gastonsanchez.com
  license: GPL-3
  summary: Package designed for working with vectors and lists of vectors, mainly for turning them into other indexed data structures.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: turner
# Title: Turn vectors and lists of vectors into indexed structures
# Version: 0.1.7
# Date: 2014-02-17
# Author: Gaston Sanchez
# Maintainer: Gaston Sanchez <gaston.stat@gmail.com>
# Description: Package designed for working with vectors and lists of vectors, mainly for turning them into other indexed data structures.
# URL: http://www.gastonsanchez.com
# Depends: R (>= 3.0)
# Imports: tester
# Suggests: testthat, knitr
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# License: GPL-3
# Collate: 'df_to_blocks.r' 'dummy_to_list.r' 'factor_to_dummy.r' 'from_to.r' 'funlist.r' 'indexify.r' 'lengths.r' 'list_ones.r' 'list_to_dummy.r' 'list_to_matrix.r' 'listify.r' 'listsize.r' 'matrix_to_blocks.r' 'vector_to_dummy.r' 'turner-package.r'
# Packaged: 2014-02-17 16:12:12 UTC; Gaston
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2014-02-17 17:35:09
